name: Elixir of Tumbling
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Wondrous Items/Elixir of Tumbling

sections.body: This draught of liquid grants the drinker the ability to tumble about, avoiding attacks and moving carefully across nearly any surface, granting a +10 competence bonus on Acrobatics checks for 1 hour.
sections.name: Description
